global.notFoundDescription2: Maybe it was moved or deleted.

welcome.weSpecialize: We specialize in authentic and naturalist tours in all region of Madagascar. Experience an immersive journey through nature, culture, and adventure.

aboutUsSection.title: About Us
aboutUsSection.subtitle: Learn more about our agency
aboutUsSection.description: Learn more about who we are and what drives us. We are a passionate team based in Madagascar, committed to offering meaningful travel experiences rooted in nature, culture, and respect.
aboutUsSection.ourMissionDescription: We aim to promote responsible tourism that respects   biodiversity, local communities, and cultural heritage. We   create immersive travel experiences that benefit both visitors   and the environment.
aboutUsSection.ourTeamDescription: We are a 100% local team of guides, drivers, and travel   coordinators who know southern Madagascar inside out. Our staff  speaks Malagasy, French, English, German and Italian, and is dedicated to making your journey unforgettable.
aboutUsSection.value1: Fair pay and treatment for all local collaborators

toursAndTripsSection.subtitle: Price Upon Request
toursAndTripsSection.title: Tours & Trips
toursAndTripsSection.description: We work in partnership with domestic airlines in Madagascar to help you coordinate flights between key destinations like Antananarivo, Morondava, Diego, Tulear, Sainte Marie, and more.

toursAndTripsList.subtitle1: From Antsirabe to Tulear and beyond — landscapes, culture, and wildlife.
toursAndTripsList.subtitle2: Adventure to the UNESCO-listed stone forest in western Madagascar.
toursAndTripsList.subtitle3: Multi-day river trip through wild nature and remote villages.
toursAndTripsList.subtitle4: Rainforest, lakes, and the famous Indri lemur — ideal short escape.
toursAndTripsList.subtitle5: Beaches, whales (in season), and island relaxation.
toursAndTripsList.subtitle6: Canyons, natural pools, and desert landscapes in Isalo Park.
toursAndTripsList.subtitle7: Northern and western Madagascar: coastal views and local charm.
toursAndTripsList.subtitle8: Discover the capital’s history, culture, and key landmarks.
toursAndTripsList.subtitle9: Explore the famous Avenue of the Baobabs, local villages, and the western coast’s laid-back charm — perfect for sunsets and scenic adventures.

carRentalSection.subtitle: Explore with Freedom
carRentalSection.title: Car Rental
carRentalSection.description: Discover Madagascar your way with our flexible and reliable car rental service. Whether you're heading to the majestic south,  exploring remote national parks, or driving along the stunning coastline, Prestiige Travel Madagascar offers the right vehicle for your journey.
carRentalSection.list2: With or without a professional driver
carRentalSection.description2: Includes rental terms, pricing, and online booking form.

travelPackagesList.detail1: ➤ Accommodation, meals, transport & guided tours included

gallerySection.subtitle: Discover Madagascar Through Our Lens
gallerySection.title: Gallery
gallerySection.description: A journey begins with a single image. Explore the stunning landscapes, unique wildlife, vibrant culture, and memorable moments captured during our real tours across southern Madagascar.

footer.weSpecialize: We specialize in authentic and naturalist tours in Madagascar.
